data.name: Space Out
data.detailed_description:
Space Out blends elements from Breakout, pinball, and a space shooter to provide a unique, fast-paced, and challenging arcade experience.

Blast through enemy spaceships, maneuver through thick nebulas, dodge spiked asteroids, and avoid falling comets. It won't be easy. Each board introduces new threats that will leave you triggered and looking for an intergalactic safe space. Luckily, there's a range of power ups to make your interstellar travels much easier. Pick up a plasma cannon to blast through asteroids or a nuke to destroy everything around you

Key Features


  • 6 challenging boards with more coming soon
  • 9 music tracks
  • 4 pain levels that effect the ball speed and extra lives
  • Local high score
  • Online leader board for each board and pain level
  • Multitude of enemies, hazards, and power ups

data.short_description: Space Out blends elements from Breakout, pinball, and a space shooter to provide a unique, fast-paced, and challenging arcade experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent, Integrated cards also work
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
